text: Badaun district is one of the districts of Uttar Pradesh state of India. Badaun city is the headquarter. It is the part of Bareilly division.https://web.archive.org/web/20120405033402/http://www.nird.org.in/brgf/doc/brgf_BackgroundNote.pdf ==At a Glance== *Area: 4234.21 Sq. Km. *Population: 31,29,000 *Male: 16,71,000 *Female: 14,58,000 *Language: Hindi *Villages: 1698 ==Tehsils== There are 5 tehsils in Budaun district. *Badaun *Bisauli *Bilsi *Dataganj *Sahaswan ==References== Category:Districts of Uttar Pradesh
title: Budaun district
